name: Caged
description:
This is a mood-driven game, you are imprisoned and have to interact with the surrounding objects in order not to go crazy. You can decide in which way you want to interact, which will eventually make you find your inner peace or lose your mind.

The game was made in 48h for #GGJ15 by:

Jose Rodolfo Freitas_Code/Shader/Game Design
@joserodolfo_f ( http://joserodolfofreitas.github.io )

Michel Wacker_Code/Game Design
@starnut (http://gentletroll.com/)

Corinna Rath_Art/Game Design
http://cocophonie.com

Meral Leyla_Music/SFX
www.pond5.com/artist/meriland

Font_pwsimplehandwriting (dafont.com)

Walk Sound_fantozzi walksforgames (freesounds.org)
